alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 12:50PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GENEVA...SOUTH CENTRAL HOUSTON...NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN HOLMES COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM CDT... At 1150 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Graceville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graceville, Hartford, Slocomb, Cottondale, Esto, Madrid, Campbellton, Noma, Black, Richter Crossroads, Kellys Crossroads, Garretts Crossroads, Tendil Crossing, Southern Junction, Holland Crossroads, Merritts Crossroads, Hendrix Crossroad, Cobb Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, and Jacobs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
